basic.color: Leaf color light green，flower color yellow

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Enjoy full sun and avoid strong light in summer
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, water thoroughly when soil is dry
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply once monthly in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove flower stem, diseased and rotten leaves timely
